quote_first: That night Cork woke, looked at the clock on the stand beside the bed -
title: Mercy Falls
author: William Kent Krueger

quote_last: “Will he help?” Yuri Androv surveyed the eleven men in the darkened control room. The wall along the left side consisted entirely of heavy plate glass looking out on Number One. That wind tunnel, the video screens, the instrument panels, everything was dormant now.
title: Project Daedalus
author: Thomas Hoover
